name: @fabric/vscode-fabric-api
displayName: Microsoft Fabric - APIs for VS Code
description: Contains APIs for interacting with Microsoft Fabric and VS Code Fabric extensions

scripts.prebuild-redist: npm run compile && shx mkdir -p obj && cpx "lib/**" obj/ && cpx "{*,.*}" obj/
scripts.build-redist: cd obj && npm exec nbgv-setversion && npm pack
scripts.postbuild-redist: shx mkdir -p redist && shx mv obj/*.tgz redist/ && shx cp obj/package.json redist/ && shx rm -rf obj
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.clean: npm exec rimraf out && npm exec rimraf lib
